tweet: This is my first tweet...I'm kinda excited!!!
Kids need to get outside and play...what about when it's raining?...YES!!
Plato You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation.
G K Chesterton The true object of all human life is play. Earth is a task garden; heaven is a playground.
Just got back from a walk/run with my dog. Got to the outside edge of our route when it started raining! That's when we started running ;)
